attributes.action: Immediately scrap all UK aid to Sudan and use his influence to stop ALL EU, US and other aid to Sudan in response to the conviction of Gillian Gibbons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sudan has proven to be an unworthy recipient for international aid. We should not be helping this state in any way, we should not be encouraging this intolerance and lunacy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
